Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery jar, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is spotted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of three lines of red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394268) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394268)
